ComicInfo.Summary:
Back Fire: Sniper beats up many ninjas and radios Guerrilla for backup. Then Dojo appears.
Code 9: Operative assigned to capture Kenneth Sharp instead disembowels him in front of his wife and child and then feels bad about it.
L.A.N.C.E.R.S.: Operative fights Holocaust while attempting to secure the portal.
Risk: Risk fights Collision and Glock on the streets of Los Angeles.
Law & Order: Law and Order massacre Louis Santenelli and his goons.
Cybrid: Cybrid massacres many ninjas while visiting the grave of Maggie.
ComicInfo.Title: Back Fire; Code 9; L.A.N.C.E.R.S.; Risk; Law & Order; Cybrid
